text: Write a record to the log for each txn to mark its starting point. When a txn finishes, the DBMS will: — Write a <COI > record on the log — Make sure that all log records are flushed before it returns an acknowledgement to application. = & CMU-D8 — 4 » PI 4% 44:12/1:15:18 - WAL PROTOCOL > œ $ q O-c 20 - Database Logging Schemes (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
